body.name: Buyya Smart LED Floor Lamp: 65 Inch RGB Corner Lamp 16 Million Colour Changing Corner Light Music Sync DIY Mode with APP/Remote Control Standing Lamps for Living Room Bedroom Decoration
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 8 hrs 13 mins
features: ❤️MODERN DESIGN WITH ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT - With 65 inch height, Buyya corner floor lamp is the highest standing lamp among the market. The floor standing lamp is designed with 4 sections of detachable lamp bars, plug and play easily and quickly. The L shape base is made of high quality iron, using screw connection, triangle design saves space also makes it more stable. You will never be afraid of it falling down or unstable any more.

📍DYNAMIC RGB+IC LIGHTING EFFECTS - Buyya floor lamp provides millions of colors and 300+ dynamic lighting modes, you can customize deiverse theme lighting or explore your preferred color to match room decorations according to emotion, space or festivals, decorate your living room, bedroom, gaming room and office with alluring lighting effects. Immerse yourself in a real fantastic lighting experience!

🎶MUSIC SYNC & LIGHTING TIMING - Smart led corner lamp built-in high-sensitivity microphone, which can intelligently identify the fluctuation of sound. Select music mode, the light will dance with the music rhythm and voice synchronously. Corner light with timing function, Preset your favorite mode and brightness. Musical modern smart corner lamp Turn on music mode in the app, the color and brightness of it will change simultaneously as music or gaming audio changes.

✨SMART APP & REMOTE CONTROL - Corner floor lamp can not only be controlled by remote control and control box, but also by mobile app control via bluetooth connection. Freely set lighting colors, modes, speed, brightness and color temperature, create your exclusive mood lighting. APP share, you can add other Buyya rgb corner floor lamp to establish a smart home lighting system!

🎨WIDE APPLICATION - Corner light bar add exciting, expressive, and romantic lighting effects to your gaming room, living room, bedroom, party, live anchor etc. Its minimalist appearance & colorful lighting can be widely used in different festival and scenes. Buyya corner floor lamp brings you a fantastic festive lighting experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It is nice
reviews.reviewText: Looks nice but if you have 2 they will get mixed up with the remotes if the rooms are close.It is ok. Little cheap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It really adds to our viewing listening experience

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars It works but.. IMO it should be cheaper.
reviews.reviewText: The product feels cheap and has poor quality; it appears that it was 3D printed. Although it is simple to assemble, it feels like it's going to be deteriorating shortly.The app is the worst element; it is clumsy, ugly, and disorganized; it does not adhere to standard app guidelines; its graphics and icons are inconsistent; some sections are too large, while others are too small; it has a side menu or configuration actions on both sides; it does not allow you to log in or connect; nor does it work with Google or Alexa.Furthermore, it is priced similarly to other products in the same category, despite the fact that the other products are well-made and have a longer history of reliability. It is not comparable to the opposition.Return it as soon as I could.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cute and colorful! But don’t last.
reviews.reviewText: The lights aren’t that steady. Make sure they are in areas that aren’t used much! But they are cute! A lot of different colors and patterns! One of the two stopped working after a couple weeks. It was fun while it lasted!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This lamp arrived safely in a box with good padding, and the lamp was easy to assemble. It has a very solid, heavy base, and feels well made. The remote control works fine, though I prefer a more chunky style of remote. But the lamp is best used via an app anyway.The duoCo Strip app that you're meant to use with the lamp didn't work on my Android tablet. I used Magic Lantern instead, which worked great. It has lots of light animation presets. Some of these are dramatic and fast-moving - good for parties. And some I find very relaxing. There are a lot of different effects - I particularly like the glowing fire one - and I was really impressed by the light show this lamp can put on! It was an eye-opener to me.The thing I most like about this lamp is getting it to synch to music. And the coolest feature here is that the lamp doesn't even need to be able to hear the music physically to synch to it if you play the music through the app. For example, you could listen to music through headphones, or play music quietly through a speaker, and the lamp will still synch to it thanks to the app.I really appreciated this feature, because earlier I used the remote control to get the lamp to synch to music, and I had to turn up the volume on my speaker quite a bit and move the speaker closer to the lamp to get the lamp to hear it properly. There's no such issue when playing music via the app.I really love this lamp. It is by far my favourite lamp. I had high hopes, and I'm really impressed and would definitely recommend trying it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: May the ambiance be with you, always!
reviews.reviewText: Enter the realm of radiant brilliance with this Buyya Floor Lamp – a luminescent marvel that transforms your living space into a symphony of colours and moods.Yes it does look like an Jedi’s weapon of choice when removing the pieces from the securely packaged box and assembling it felt like constructing the ultimate lightsaber, with each section a step closer to harnessing the force of radiant brilliance, giving me the power to transform my space into a Jedi sanctuary, where the aura of colours danced like a lightsaber in the skilled hands of Yoda himself! However, assembling this beacon of light was as smooth as a moonlit waltz and so easy that even an Ewok could comfortably complete the task. It is the perfect solution for the spatially challenged and effortlessly claimed its corner in my living room, standing tall at 5.4ft. The option to remove a section, like a magician's vanishing act, allows it to also adapt to the ever-changing dance of your decor.Facing the lamp towards you, it becomes a personal spotlight, orchestrating a ballet of brightness and ambiance. Alternatively, a shift towards the wall ushered in a cascade of mood lighting, creating an enchanting atmosphere.The included controller, a lightsaber hilt in disguise, grants you dominion over a spectrum of colours and patterns. With each press, you summon the force to dictate brightness, hues, and even music mode. Syncing with the app elevated the experience, letting the lamp groove to the rhythm of my tunes. A microphone in the lamp ensured it danced in harmony with the melodies, a spectacle to behold. Yes, it even danced to the closing beats of the East Enders theme tune from my nearby TV when in music mode!So, here's to the Buyya Floor Lamp – not just a lighting fixture but a maestro of ambiance and minimalist elegance, ready to transform any space into a vibrant canvas of illumination. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: A very impressive light that can emit a kaleidoscope of colours
reviews.reviewText: Initially out of stock, this light took a few weeks to get to me but it is quite a talking point once assembled and operational. It comes in 4 pieces + the control base and the rods can be assembled to the height you wish and so not all of it needs to be used. I was expecting the material to be heavier but it appears to be made of a light plastic and it can easily be knocked over which is a negative. Once it is working it gives off a very impressive light show and a multitude of displays can be selected either by using the remote (preferred) or downloading the suggested app (not required). At a price of £72.99 (at time of review), I would be hesitant to say that this is good value for money but I am no expert on the retail price point of this type of light. It is certainly unusual and a definite talking point when switched on!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Love this lamp for it's many colours and features
reviews.reviewText: Buyya Floor Lamp, LED Floor Lamp RGB Dimmable Colour Changing Standing LightThe lamp was easy to assemble, and the separate sections of the light bar slid together easily. It took me about 5 minutes to assemble and hours of fun playing with all the effects.It's quite tall, coming in at 5ft 4 inches and sits nicely in the corner of my room.There are so many settings, I still haven't figured them all out yet. Everything from strobes to fades, and multiple sequence modes to a static light effect with varied colour options.You can speed up, slow down, adjust the brightness/colours, set it to music or leave it to illuminate the corner of your room with a constant glow. I have yet to download the APP, mainly because the remote control has so many options. There is also a timer function for switching on and off.I also have the ELOUYCKE Smart LED colour-changing corner/floor lamp (which is also awesome), but of the two, I prefer this floor lamp because the base is round as opposed to two angled feet, which are more difficult to position in a room.This lamp is magical. Great for upbeat parties or a more relaxed affair. Mine stands in the corner of my room where I often set it to a warm amber glow. I love this lamp.Well worth the price, in my opinion.Overall, a fab lamp, which is powered by a corded plug, which is a bonus as so many gadgets these days are now USB and there are only so many USB sockets you can use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This lamp comes in parts, well-packaged, and with commendably clear instructions. It's very easy to assemble, and to take apart. Unfortunately, the ease of disassembly proved to be one its best features, because it's not much good as a light.Firstly, and most importantly, it's not bright enough. It won't illuminate even a small room adequately, so it doesn’t work as a main or even a secondary light source. It does have a range of 16 million colours, and, because of its construction, it is capable of some quite pleasant colour lighting effects. This is easiest to control via the app. There's no Alexa or Google Home integration.Sadly, even as mood lighting, it isn't bright enough. When initially switched on, it's very dim indeed. Once the correct number of pixels is selected in the app, this does improve, but it doesn't get close to providing enough illumination to be useful for anything other than a decoration.For the current price of £72.99, this is very poor value, and I can't recommend it.
